title: nueva vida para Un millón de personas - United Nations Development Programme | UNDP
author: United Nations Development Programme December
description: To mark World AIDS Day 2017, meet Zimbabweans living with HIV as they explain how access to ART treatment has transformed their lives and secured their futures.
